thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 6 of 141
thread.title: Kathryn

author: Kathryn
title: Kathryn
text: These labels are fantastic! We use them on all the kids things, from baby bottles headed daily to and from daycare to pencil boxes left at school for a year. No matter how long they are there, they always look as if I applied them only yesterday. The laundry tags are also fantastic. I was skeptical of the shoe labels - how could the possibly not be disgusting when applied to the inside of soccer cleats. Just like every other label we've used, they work perfectly!
